text: The Croatia women's national handball team is the national handball team of Croatia. It is governed by the Croatian Handball Federation and takes part in international team handball competitions. ==Results== ===Olympic Games=== *2012 – 7th ===World Championship=== *1957 to 1990 – Was part of Yugoslavia *1995 – 10th *1997 – 6th *2003 – 14th *2005 – 11th *2007 – 9th *2011 – 7th ===European Championship=== *1994 – 5th *1996 – 6th *2004 – 13th *2006 – 7th *2008 – 6th *2010 – 9th *2012 – 13th *2014 – 13th *2016 – 16th *2018 – 16th *2020 – Qualified ===Other Competitions=== * Carpathian Trophy 1999 – 2nd * Carpathian Trophy 2008 – 2nd * Carpathian Trophy 1996 – 3rd * Carpathian Trophy 2005 – 3rd * Carpathian Trophy 2007 – 3rd ==Current squad== Squad for the 2018 European Women's Handball Championship.2018 European Women's Handball Championship squad Head coach: Nenad Šoštarić ==References== * * ==External links== * *IHF profile National team Handball Category:Women's national handball teams
title: Croatia women's national handball team
